title: Meta Finally Lets Users Appeal Bans in Social VR App ‘Horizon Worlds’
description:
Meta announced it’s finally giving Horizon Worlds¬†users the ability to file an appeal when suspected of breaking the social VR app’s Code of Conduct. It’s been nearly three years since Meta first released Horizon Worlds in open beta, however now the company has pushed its v149 update which includes the ability to file an appeal […]
